OrangehrmDashboardPage.description: The Dashboard page provides a summary view of key information and actions for the logged-in user, including time at work, pending actions, quick launch options, and recent buzz posts.

elements.name: Dashboard Header
elements.description: The main header text of the Dashboard page.

elements.name: Time at Work Widget
elements.description: Widget displaying the user's time at work information.

elements.name: My Actions Widget
elements.description: Widget displaying the user's pending actions.

elements.name: Leave Requests to Approve Link
elements.description: Link to the Leave Requests to Approve page.

elements.name: Quick Launch Widget
elements.description: Widget displaying quick launch options.

elements.name: Assign Leave Quick Launch
elements.description: Quick launch button to assign leave.

elements.name: Buzz Latest Posts Widget
elements.description: Widget displaying the latest buzz posts.

elements.name: User Profile Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown button to access user profile options.

assertions: Verify that the page title contains 'OrangeHRM'
Verify that the 'Dashboard' header is displayed
Verify that the 'Time at Work' widget is displayed
Verify that the 'My Actions' widget is displayed
Verify that the 'Quick Launch' widget is displayed
Verify that the 'Buzz Latest Posts' widget is displayed

UnknownPage.description: This page displays a list of employees and allows filtering and searching for specific employees. It is part of the PIM (Personnel Information Management) module.

elements.name: Employee Name Input
elements.description: Input field for filtering employees by name.

elements.name: Employee Id Input
elements.description: Input field for filtering employees by ID.

elements.name: Employment Status Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown for filtering employees by employment status.

elements.name: Include Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown for filtering employees by inclusion criteria (e.g., Current Employees Only).

elements.name: Supervisor Name Input
elements.description: Input field for filtering employees by supervisor name.

elements.name: Job Title Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown for filtering employees by job title.

elements.name: Sub Unit Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown for filtering employees by sub unit.

elements.name: Reset Button
elements.description: Button to reset the filter criteria.

elements.name: Search Button
elements.description: Button to apply the filter criteria and search for employees.

elements.name: Add Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the 'Add Employee' page.
